synopsis.text:
Tetsu, a seemingly ordinary high school student, finds his life turned upside down when he encounters a mysterious shape-shifting creature he affectionately names 'Cenco.' Living secretly with Cenco, Tetsu's world takes a dramatic turn when a classmate discovers his secret and a strange boy named Shuu appears, attacking Cenco and triggering a series of unexpected events. Just as the chaos seems to subside, another girl, Kaname, enters the scene, searching for Shuu and igniting a new chapter of adventures for Tetsu, Yuki, and Cenco.

In the anticipated sequel to "Cencoroll," the enigmatic past of the relentless Shuu, who continues to pursue Cenco, comes to light. Meanwhile, Yuki learns to harness Cenco's shape-shifting abilities, preparing herself for the unforeseen dangers that lie ahead.

Director Uki Atsuya has announced his involvement in the creation of Cencoroll 2, currently working on the scenario and storyboard, promising a sequel as captivating as its predecessor.
